descriptions:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.”
It sleeps at the bottom of a lake
to keep the world in balance.

It is thought that UXIE, MESPRIT
and AZELF all came from the same
egg.

When AZELF flew, people gained the
determination to do things.
It was the birth of willpower.

This Pokémon is said to have endowed
humans with the determination needed
to face any of life’s difficulties.

The dreaded Being of Willpower. Legends tell of this Pokémon
manipulating the will of its adversaries and turning them into
puppets of its own.
name: Azelf
